com.samsung.multiscreenplayer.controller

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreenplayer.controller.AppController

  • public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main application controller. Controls connection with TV and views. Initializes and keeps multi-screen cast manager, holds information about CHANNEL_ID and APP_ID for cast manager.
    Author:
    m.gajewski, j.bielak

    • Nested Class Summary
